body_html:
Yes, but your code does not seems in training time... Please try it with volatile. I had similar issues and solved by this.
…
On 26 Jul 2017 8:19 p.m., "Rasool Fakoor" ***@***.***> wrote: But the problem is not the eval time, it is training time. In the eval, the backward()/optimizer.step() will not be called anyway. — You are receiving this because you commented. body:
Yes,  but your code does not seems in training time... Please try it with
volatile. I had similar issues and solved by this.

On 26 Jul 2017 8:19 p.m., "Rasool Fakoor" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> But the problem is not the eval time, it is training time. In the eval,
> the backward()/optimizer.step() will not be called anyway.
>
